attributes.action: to investigate the  decision of  organizations and  agencies who use data protection  to  use the abusive tag to deny investigation into the discretionary issues
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This has been done by most agencies set up on same [ corporate call centre] system with data protection. They then  use this  unfairly and inappropriately  to deny fair and honest treatment of health and safety, fraud and human rights issues . Evidence of severe maladministration and misacarriage of civil justice  can be found on FOI website whatsdotheyknow  under my requests .NOW BANNED? !
